work.position: Senior Web Developer & Web Project Strategist
work.summary: At BKDSN I use digital leadership to design and develop client projects ranging from user experience, strategy & web application prototyping to full stack applications. For larger clients I like to specialize, for smaller clients I like to be involved from concept to production.
highlights: Management: Working primarily with marketing teams in coordinating with design & management on small and medium scale projects. I identify needs, determine feasibility, set timelines and meet budget, user experience and technical expectations.
UX Design: Using knowledge of available solutions and the feasibility of designing custom solutions to guide and invigorate strategy teams in architecting and prototyping projects.

Web Development: Extending existing client solutions, integrating 3rd party applications and building, testing and deploying web products, ranging from single page applications on S3 (HTML/Jekyll) to custom company intranets (Wordpress/PHP).

work.summary: Worked as technical lead, designing for various e-commerce storefronts, maintaining and deploying our catalogues to an array of backend systems, instructing & training franchisees/employees and advising management on new technical solutions.
highlights: Advisory: My major responsibilities included walking franchisees through our technical stack, building and giving web presentations to employees and hosting private training and Q&A sessions for sales.

Web Development & Design: Responsible for launching & maintaining proprietary and franchisee presences on various e-commerce platforms including BigCommerce and eBay & Amazon stores. Major areas of focus were storefront design, API interactions and product catalogue asset management and optimization.

Database: While at MIW, my most focused (and fun) task was managing proprietary and franchisee databases from design to deployment. My main areas of focus were automating & troubleshooting both static & API-driven imports from supplier databases, supplier priority chains for automating pricing & shipping calculations and managing both requirements and implementation of automated product addition/deletion.

work.summary: Worked with marketing teams to help build and deploy client solutions including HTML ads and stable marketing email campaigns.
highlights: Developing websites on a LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL and PHP)
Developed website front ends using HTML, CSS and Javascript
Designing and delivering HTML ads for client campaigns
